library(matlib)

# Version 4

## Example 1

### Find all solution of systems of linear equations of the form **Ax=b**

A \<- matrix(c(1, 2, 3, 4, 2, 3, 4, 1, 3, 4, 1, 2, 4, 1, 2, 3), 4, 4, byrow=TRUE)

colnames(A) \<- paste0('x', 1:4)

b \<- c(20, 26, 28, 26)

#### Show equations

showEqn(A, b, fractions = TRUE, latex = TRUE)

$$
\begin{array}{lllllllll}
1 \cdot x_1 &+& 2 \cdot x_2 &+& 3 \cdot x_3 &+& 4 \cdot x_4  &=&  20 \\ 
2 \cdot x_1 &+& 3 \cdot x_2 &+& 4 \cdot x_3 &+& 1 \cdot x_4  &=&  26 \\ 
3 \cdot x_1 &+& 4 \cdot x_2 &+& 1 \cdot x_3 &+& 2 \cdot x_4  &=&  28 \\ 
4 \cdot x_1 &+& 1 \cdot x_2 &+& 2 \cdot x_3 &+& 3 \cdot x_4  &=&  26 \\ 
\end{array}
$$

#### Solve:

Solve(A, b, fractions = TRUE, verbose = TRUE)

#### Echelon form with the steps, as the row operations neccessary to reduce X to identity matrix I:

echelon(A, b, verbose=TRUE, fractions=TRUE)

Ginv(A, verbose = TRUE, fractions = TRUE)

plotEqn3d(A,b, xlim=c(0,5), ylim=c(0,5))
